subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Evan Turner had 26 points and 10 rebounds, and Thaddeus Young added 17 points and 12 rebounds to lead the host Philadelphia 76ers to an overtime win over the Celtics on Friday.
snippet: Evan Turner had 26 points and 10 rebounds, and Thaddeus Young added 17 points and 12 rebounds to lead the host Philadelphia 76ers to an overtime win over the Celtics on Friday.
